flixel.system.debug.ConsoleUtil

type
class
A set of helper functions used by the console.

Static Methods

attemptToCreateInstance_flixel_FlxObject(ClassName : String, type : Class<flixel.FlxObject>, ?Params : Array<String>) : Dynamic

metadata
:noCompletion
:noUsing

attemptToCreateInstance_flixel_FlxState(ClassName : String, type : Class<flixel.FlxState>, ?Params : Array<String>) : Dynamic

metadata
:noCompletion
:noUsing

callFunction(Function : Dynamic, Args : Array<Dynamic>) : Bool

parameters
Function The reference to the function to call.
Args An array of arguments.
returns
Whether or not it was possible to safely call the function.
Safely calls a function via Reflection with an array of dynamic arguments. Prevents a crash from happening if there are too many Arguments (the additional ones are removed and the function is called anyway) or too few

findCommand(Alias : String, Commands : Array<Command>) : Command

parameters
Alias The Alias to search for.
Commands The array of commands to search through
returns
The Command typdef - null if none was found.
Searches for the Command typedef for a given Alias within a Command Array.

inline log(Text : Dynamic) : Void

parameters
Text The text to log.
Shortcut to log a text with the Console LogStyle.

parseDataArray(Data : Array<Dynamic>) : Array<Dynamic>

parameters
Data The data array to parse
returns
The parsed Data.
Attempts to parse an array of Strings and Arrays into standard types (mostly needed for Bools - Ints and Floats should work out of the box with Reflect.callMethod()). Used by callFunction().

resolveObjectAndVariable(ObjectAndVariable : String, ObjectMap : Map<String, Dynamic>) : PathToVariable

parameters
ObjectAndVariable The path to the variable as a String
ObjectMap A Map of registered objects to start the search from
returns
A PathToVarible typedef, or null.
Helper function for the set command. Attempts to find the object which contains the variable to set from the String path, like "FlxG.state.sprite.x" so it can be set via Reflection.
